title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 23 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 23! How was your weekend? Did you have any time to yourself? (I had Saturday morning free!) Did you get to rest? (I got a good nightâ€™s sleep on Saturday-YAY) Did you do meal prep? (I made instant pot black beans + fruit salad_ Do you know whatâ€™s for dinner tonight? Iâ€™d love to see your creations! Hereâ€™s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!! You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU! The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list series on Shutterbean.com, created by Tracy Benjamin of The Handwriting Club. What started as a personal planning ritual turned into a structured planner designed to help you organize your week with intention, creativity, and accountability. Follow along every Monday for inspiration, productivity tips, and a space to map out your goals!

Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 23!Â  How was your weekend?

Did you have any time to yourself?Â  (I had Saturday morning free!)

Did you get to rest?Â  (I got a good nightâ€™s sleep on Saturday-YAY)

Did you do meal prep?Â  (I made instant pot black beans + fruit salad_

Do you know whatâ€™s for dinner tonight?Â Â

Also, if you need to reset and check in with yourself, Iâ€™m hosting this workshop next month!
